document.full_text: israel saturday called on the u.n. to cancel a report which said it had committed war crimes during its december 2008-january 2009 gaza offensive, after its author said he may have been wrong.
document.title: israel urges u.n. to cancel gaza war crimes report
lines_and_colors: israel saturday called on the u.n. to cancel a report which said it had committed war crimes during its december 2008-january 2009 gaza offensive, after its author said he may have been wrong.
